Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/33rd
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Cicero, I-55 and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Cicero, I-55, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Midway
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
